description: The LIDCOM Education Loan Scheme by the Maharashtra Leather Industries Development Corporation provides financial assistance to Scheduled Caste (SC) students in Maharashtra for pursuing higher education, including professional and technical courses. The scheme aims to support SC students in achieving academic and professional success through concessional loans.
key_features: Loans for SC students at concessional rates

benefits.interest_rate: Concessional rates as per LIDCOM norms

education_criteria: Students pursuing professional or technical courses at graduate or postgraduate level
Courses must be recognized by UGC, AICTE, or equivalent
additional_criteria: Applicant must belong to Scheduled Castes (SC) as per Maharashtra government norms
Must be a resident of Maharashtra
Annual family income criteria may apply (as per LIDCOM guidelines)

eligible_courses_delhi: Engineering, medical, law, management, and other professional courses
Technical courses approved by regulatory bodies

steps: Obtain application form from LIDCOM office
Submit completed form with required documents
application_process.note: Contact LIDCOM office for specific application procedures

special_notes: Loan amount and interest rates subject to LIDCOM discretion
Covers tuition and related educational expenses
Repayment terms may vary based on course duration
